name: Stir-Fried Chicken with Holy Basil
description: [Photograph: Luk Thys] Reprinted with permission from Bangkok Street Food by Tom Vandenberghe and Eva Verplaetse. Copyright © 2010. Published by Lannoo. Available wherever books are sold. All rights reserved....
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces chicken breast, boned and chopped in small pieces

recipeInstructions.text:
Heat the wok on a medium heat. Add oil and garlic, stir-fry for
a few seconds. Turn on the heat and add the chicken. Add chilli
and half of the basil. Stir-fry for 1 minute, add fish sauce, sugar and
water or stock. Turn down the heat on low. Add the rest of the basil,
stir-fry for a few seconds and serve on rice.
